about_the_game:
Vampdoll: The Blood-Drinking Maidens

...They are girls who can only survive by drinking the blood of other girls.
To exterminate the grotesque beings known as "Werewolves",
they fight under the code name "Stray Dog Carnage".
As their "rations", they are provided with girls known as "Bride Thorns".

About the Game

This game is a "yuri" girls' love story, where you witness the emotions between girls who have become vampires and their human partners.
What endings will they each choose...?

Synopsis

The era is Meiji.

Sana Shirafuji, who lost her grandmother and is left alone in the world,
knocks on the military's door to become a "Bride Thorn" to make a living.

A "Bride Thorn" is a "ration" for girls known as "Vampdolls",
who are specialized in combat.
Unaware of this, Sana accepts the military contract out of desperation.
On her first day of enlistment, she meets
Yukine Hanafusa, a beautiful yet disdainful Vampdoll.

Gradually, Sana and Yukine begin to understand each other.
On the first night of blood drinking,
they discover that the act of drinking blood brings physical and emotional exhilaration.
Despite their awkwardness, they experience their first blood drinking together.

Some time later, Yukine becomes incapacitated during a certain operation...

Highlights

  • Diverse graphics by manga artist Saku Takano.
  • A story that captures the delicate emotions of the girls.
  • A pure love girls' love story with the concept of "Vampires x Military Uniforms x Yuri".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A visual novel game featuring a pure love girls' love story bound by blood, with the concept of "Vampires x Military Uniforms x girls' love (yuri) ."
